messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2470
messages.messageBody:
Pam wrote:

<You are under no
obligation to lie to us and say you think we're right, we're under
no obligation to lie to you and say, "oh, yes, mothers always
know best and of course you're doing it right" if we don't think so.>

Thanks for this. I agree wholeheartedly. Open-minded doesn't means your
brains have fallen out. When did being open-minded start meaning that you
agree with everything? And how could you agree with everything? Being
open-minded simply means you'll listen and CONSIDER the other possibilities.
I've listened to Myranda's arguments and I still think her choice is wrong.
No more, no less. Doesn't mean she's not a really nice person. Doesn't mean
I won't agree with her in the future.

Cherry in GA
